Jan 5 (Reuters) - Stellantis NV STLA.MI And Amazon AMZN.O:: *COLLABORATES WITH AMAZON TO DEVELOP CUSTOMER-CENTRIC CONNECTED EXPERIENCES ACROSS MILLIONS OF VEHICLES *SOFTWARE SOLUTIONS TO BE DEPLOYED IN STLA SMARTCOCKPIT, NEW DIGITAL COCKPIT PLATFORM TO BE LAUNCHED IN 2024 *GLOBAL, MULTI-YEAR AGREEMENT INVOLVES AMAZON DEVICES, AMAZON WEB SERVICES (AWS) AND AMAZON LAST MILE *Further company coverage: STLA.MIAMZN.O

  • (Reporting by Gdansk Newsroom)
  • ((Gdansk.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com; +48 58 7696600;))

((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 05-JAN-202213:30:05.9 GMT
